item.description:
Taranta (http://www.tarantarist.com/) is one of the best restaurants in the North End. Chef/Owner Jose Duarte is from Peru but got his culinary training in the U.S. The menu features a mix of Italian and Peruvian delicacies. This event will take place on Restaurant Week. So a special 3-course menu will be available for $33.12. (Some items require a little extra.) See site below.

http://www.tarantarist.com/restaurant-week/Â Since they don't have a bar, we'll have our cocktail hour (6:00-7:00) at Tresca (233 Hanover St.), diagonally accross the street. Taranta is on the first block of Hanover St. on the left if you're coming from the Greenway. Tresca is on the first block on the right. Please bring cash, as we won't get separate checks. Thank you.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: Cocktails 6:00-7:00 at Tresca, 233 Hanover St. After 7:00 ask for Jim's group at Taranta
item.name: Taranta-Restaurant Week Dinner
